nab.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to catch or arrest someone who is doing something wrong
nab.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: The police nabbed him for speeding.
nab.translation[0].definitions[1].defini: to get something or someone quickly, especially before anyone else can get them
nab.translation[0].definitions[1].exampl: See if you can nab a seat.
